trans-unit.source: Represents the binding element used to specify the queuing communication properties for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service that uses the native Message Queuing (MSMQ) protocol.
trans-unit.target: 表示用來為 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務指定佇列通訊屬性的繫結項目 (該服務會使用原生 Message Queuing (MSMQ) 通訊協定)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement> enables the user to set the properties of the queued communication channel.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement> 可讓使用者設定佇列通訊通道的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The queued communication channel uses Message Queuing for its transport.
trans-unit.target: 佇列通訊通道的傳輸中會使用訊息佇列。

trans-unit.source: This binding element is the default binding element used by the Message Queuing standard binding (<xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding>).
trans-unit.target: 這個繫結項目是訊息佇列標準繫結 (<xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding>) 所使用的預設繫結項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSessionChannel" /> or a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSessionChannel" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel" /> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> with which to build the channel factory.
trans-unit.target: 用來建置通道處理站的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Builds a channel factory using the context provided.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的內容建置通道處理站。

trans-unit.source: A Message Queuing (MSMQ) channel factory that can be used to create channels to send messages to existing Message Queuing applications.
trans-unit.target: 可用來建立通道的訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 通道處理站，以便將訊息傳送到現有的訊息佇列應用程式。

trans-unit.source: A channel factory is created and initialized using the properties that have been set in the binding element.
trans-unit.target: 會建立通道處理站，而且會使用繫結項目中已設定的屬性來加以初始化。

trans-unit.source: The initialized channel factory is then used to create output channels that can be used to send messages to a message queue.
trans-unit.target: 然後會使用初始化的通道處理站來建立輸出通道，這些通道可用來將訊息傳送到訊息佇列。

trans-unit.source: The context value is null.
trans-unit.target: 內容值為 null。

trans-unit.source: The TChannel is not IOutputChannel or IOutputSessionChannel.
trans-unit.target: TChannel 不是 IOutputChannel 或 IOutputSessionChannel。

trans-unit.source: MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqProtectionLevel is EncryptAndSign and UseActiveDirectory is false.
trans-unit.target: MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqProtectionLevel 為 EncryptAndSign 而且 UseActiveDirectory 為 false。

trans-unit.source: The channel type to be used to build the channel listener.
trans-unit.target: 要用於建置通道接聽程式的通道型別。

trans-unit.source: Permitted channel types are <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSessionChannel" /> or a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 允許的通道型別為 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSessionChannel" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel" /> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> with which to build the channel listener.
trans-unit.target: 用來建置通道接聽程式的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Builds a channel listener using the context provided.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的內容建置通道接聽程式。

trans-unit.source: A Message Queuing (MSMQ) channel listener that can be used to create channels to receive messages from existing MSMQ applications.
trans-unit.target: 可用來建立通道的訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 通道接聽程式，以便從現有的 MSMQ 應用程式接收訊息。

trans-unit.source: The context value is null.
trans-unit.target: 內容值為 null。

trans-unit.source: The TChannel is not IInputChannel or IInputSessionChannel.
trans-unit.target: TChannel 不是 IInputChannel 或 IInputSessionChannel。

trans-unit.source: MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqAuthenticationMode is Certificate or WindowsDomain and MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqProtectionLevel is None.
trans-unit.target: MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqAuthenticationMode 為 Certificate，或者 WindowsDomain 和 MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqProtectionLevel 為 None。

trans-unit.source: The channel type to be used to build the channel listener.
trans-unit.target: 要用於建置通道接聽程式的通道型別。

trans-unit.source: Permitted channel types are <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSessionChannel" /> or a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 允許的通道型別為 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSessionChannel" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel" /> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> with which to build the channel factory.
trans-unit.target: 用來建置通道處理站的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether you can build a channel factory with the context provided.
trans-unit.target: 傳回布林值，這個值會指出您是否可以使用所提供的內容來建置通道處理站。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if you can build a channel factory with the context provided; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以使用所提供的內容來建置通道處理站，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The binding element returns <see langword="true" /> only when <paramref name="TChannel" /> is <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel" /> or <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSessionChannel" />.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 <see langword="true" /> 為 <paramref name="TChannel" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel" /> 時，此繫結項目才會傳回 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSessionChannel" />。

trans-unit.source: The channel type to be used to build the channel listener.
trans-unit.target: 要用於建置通道接聽程式的通道型別。

trans-unit.source: Permitted channel types are <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSessionChannel" /> or a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 允許的通道型別為 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSessionChannel" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel" /> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> with which to build the channel listener.
trans-unit.target: 用來建置通道接聽程式的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether you can build a channel listener with the context provided.
trans-unit.target: 傳回布林值，這個值會指出您是否可以使用所提供的內容來建置通道接聽程式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if you can build a channel listener with the context provided; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以使用所提供的內容來建置通道接聽程式，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The binding returns <see langword="true" /> only when <paramref name="TChannel" /> is <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel" /> or <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSessionChannel" />.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 <see langword="true" /> 為 <paramref name="TChannel" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel" /> 時，此繫結才會傳回 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSessionChannel" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a clone of the binding element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回繫結項目的複製品 (Clone)。

trans-unit.source: A clone of the binding element.
trans-unit.target: 繫結項目的複製品。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an integer that specifies the maximum size of the pool that contains internal Message Queuing (MSMQ) message objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定整數，這個整數會指定包含內部訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 訊息物件之集區大小的上限。

trans-unit.source: An integer that specifies the maximum size of the pool that contains internal Message Queuing message objects.
trans-unit.target: 指定包含內部訊息佇列訊息物件之集區大小上限的整數。

trans-unit.source: The internal Message Queuing message object pool is used to avoid allocations of these objects when sending and receiving messages.
trans-unit.target: 內部訊息佇列訊息物件集區是用來在收送訊息時避免這些物件的配置。

trans-unit.source: The maximum pool size is a performance-tuning parameter.
trans-unit.target: 集區大小的上限是效能調整參數。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 8.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 8。

trans-unit.source: The value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 這個值小於零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an enumeration value that indicates the queued communication channel transport that this binding uses.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定列舉值，這個值表示此繫結所使用的佇列通訊通道傳輸。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol" /> enumeration value that indicates the transport used for message delivery between queue managers.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol" /> 列舉值，這個值表示在佇列管理員之間用於訊息傳遞的傳輸。

trans-unit.source: Message Queuing (MSMQ) does not support Active Directory addressing when using SOAP Reliable Messaging Protocol (SRMP), so do not set <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement.QueueTransferProtocol%2A> to <xref:System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol.Srmp> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol.Srmp> when <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement.UseActiveDirectory%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 在使用 SOAP Reliable Messaging Protocol (SRMP) 時不支援 Active Directory 定址，所以當 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement.QueueTransferProtocol%2A> 設定為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol.Srmp> 時，請勿將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol.Srmp> 設定為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement.UseActiveDirectory%2A> 或 `true`。

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 該值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the addressing scheme that is used by this transport binding element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.String" />，其中包含這個傳輸繫結項目所使用的定址配置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the addressing scheme that is used by this transport binding element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，其中包含這個傳輸繫結項目所使用的定址配置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement.Scheme%2A> property returns the string "net.msmq".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement.Scheme%2A> 屬性會傳回 "net.msmq" 這個字串。

trans-unit.source: The Message Queuing (MSMQ) queued transport supports several addressing schemes, including net.msmq.
trans-unit.target: 訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 佇列傳輸支援數個定址配置，包括 net.msmq。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether queue addresses should be converted using Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: 傳回布林值，這個值會指出是否應該使用 Active Directory 來轉換佇列位址。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if queue addresses should be converted using Active Directory; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該使用 Active Directory 來轉換佇列位址，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Message Queuing (MSMQ) queue addresses can consist of path names or direct format names.
trans-unit.target: 訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 佇列位址可以由路徑名稱或直接格式名稱所組成。

trans-unit.source: With a direct format name, MSMQ resolves the queue name using DNS, NetBIOS, or IP.
trans-unit.target: 如為直接格式名稱，MSMQ 會使用 DNS、NetBIOS 或 IP 解析佇列名稱。

trans-unit.source: With a path name, MSMQ resolves the queue name using Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: 如為路徑名稱，MSMQ 會使用 Active Directory 解析佇列名稱。

trans-unit.source: By default, the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] queued transport converts the URI of a message queue to a direct format name.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 佇列的傳輸會將訊息佇列的 URI 轉換成直接格式名稱。

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement.UseActiveDirectory%2A> property to `true`, an application can specify that the queued transport should resolve the computer name using Active Directory rather than DNS, NetBIOS, or IP.
trans-unit.target: 藉由將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement.UseActiveDirectory%2A> 屬性設定為 `true`，應用程式可以指定佇列傳輸應使用 Active Directory 來解析電腦名稱，而非使用 DNS、NetBIOS 或 IP 來解析。
